description: HTTP header injection vulnerability in Everything version 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2 except the Lite version may allow a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script or alter the website that uses the product.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: all versions of 1.2 (Everything 1.2 series) except the Lite version
all versions of 1.0 (Everything 1.0 series) except the Lite version
all versions of 1.1 (Everything 1.1 series) except the Lite version
